snippet.title: Bushiden - Official Exclusive Story Trailer
snippet.description: Bushiden is a retro ninja action-game that pays tribute to the classics like Ninja Gaiden and Castlevania, which will arrive on PC and Switch sometime in 2021.

localized.title: Bushiden - Official Exclusive Story Trailer
localized.description: Bushiden is a retro ninja action-game that pays tribute to the classics like Ninja Gaiden and Castlevania, which will arrive on PC and Switch sometime in 2021.
